title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7439.5 - Food service sanitation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7439.5 - Food service sanitation

State Regulations
(a) OCFS
shall require that the food service areas in each secure facility, including
equipment and utensils, are maintained in a safe, secure and sanitary
manner. (b) OCFS shall specify the
sanitary procedures which are to be employed in the food service areas of each
secure facility. (c) OCFS shall
require that all persons working in the food service area of a secure facility
conform to hygienic practices consistent with the State Sanitary

Code. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7439.5

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
